resources.string: Peppermint is great for relieving headaches. Rub it across the forehead and on the temples.
In lab testing, the Young Living blend R.C. blend wiped out MRSA!
The Young Living blend Purification takes the sting out of fire ant bites.
For babies, use Lemon oil along the spine for a fever
For babies, use Myrtle oil for congestion
Frankincense is working in clinical trials to cure many kinds of cancer!
Lavender is the Swiss Army knife in your essential oil toolkit - anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-fungal!
Concerned about your kids swallowing their toothpaste? Try KidScents!
Thieves Spray is a great way to stop the flu before it starts!
Use the Young Living blend R.C. for respiratory problems. Rub topically on chest and diffuse.
